search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Certifier (certifier.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Certifier is: [https://certifier.io/pricing](https://certifier.io/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Organizations of all sizes streamline certification process with Certifier
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

All companies

![Image 84: Azusa Pacific University](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864304%2Fimage_221_3_ym0gex.png&w=256&q=75)

Certifier boosts focus on priorities

Nothing but good things to say! Certifier makes the certification process easier, allowing us to focus more on what really matters in our daily operations.

![Image 85: Steve McLean](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863874%2FEllipse_62_1_fmnigv.png&w=128&q=75)Steve McLean

Associate director / Ed tech admin

![Image 86: Django Dev](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864308%2Fimage_303_rp2feb.png&w=96&q=75)

amazing and easy to use

I've been using Certifier for a while to make and send badges to my students. It's amazing and easy to use.

![Image 87: Paulo Andrade](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863892%2Fimage_3_xrm0de.png&w=128&q=75)Paulo Andrade

Programming teacher

![Image 88: KEDC](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864307%2Fimage_220_1_mr2um1.png&w=256&q=75)

Essential L&D Resource

Certifier provides professional holistic digital certifications to participants, and they are preserved for later access. The tool is an essential resource in our L&D strategy.

![Image 89: Rachel Holbrook](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863889%2FEllipse_61_2_oge5sp.png&w=128&q=75)Rachel Holbrook

Deeper Learning Specialist

![Image 90: MyQuest](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864308%2Fimage_221_ea57i9.png&w=256&q=75)

Automated Badge Excellence

Loved how I can customize the badges for our certifications using Certifier! I don’t have to manually send badges and certificates to trainees when they complete courses.

![Image 91: Samuel Robinson](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863896%2FEllipse_61_1_xog99n.png&w=128&q=75)Samuel Robinson

Director of Partnerships

![Image 92: myStockOptions.com](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864308%2Fimage_302_ssew7m.png&w=384&q=75)

Simple setup, easy sharing

Program did what we wanted and more at the standard level. Seemed understandable how to set up. Someone can easily download the certficate, add to LinkedIn Profile, and share on social media.

![Image 93: Bruce Brumberg](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863894%2Fimage_2_thk8pa.png&w=128&q=75)Bruce Brumberg

Co-Founder

![Image 94: Revgenius](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864304%2Fimage_220_3_ospatd.png&w=256&q=75)

Perfect for scaling certifications

Certifier is terrific for driving visibility of our extensive certification processes. It helps us easily manage and certify a large number of certificates and badges, which is crucial for our expansive operations.

![Image 95: Artyom Celegato](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863875%2FEllipse_61_5_ix99tj.png&w=128&q=75)Artyom Celegato

Data and Revops Executive

![Image 96: Workjam](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864304%2Fimage_308_yfqv4u.png&w=256&q=75)

Fast setup, responsive support

Certifier is a fantastic option for automating certification processes! User-friendly, learned to use it within 30 minutes. Responsive customer service team, provided a branded email template.

![Image 97: Madison Lokke](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863877%2Fimage_7_sl2sfg.png&w=128&q=75)Madison Lokke

Marketing Specialist

![Image 98: Anerucan University of Central Asia](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864304%2Fimage_307_w4s5si.png&w=384&q=75)

Easy, flexible, affordable

We decided to stop issuing paper-based certificates and stopped on the Certifier. It is easy to use, we can change the design even for the issued certificates, the cost of the license is affordable.

![Image 99: Ekaterina Kombarova](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863882%2Fimage_6_m6a7rs.png&w=128&q=75)Ekaterina Kombarova

Faculty Developer

![Image 100: Appricotsoft](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864308%2Fimage_304_eienay.png&w=384&q=75)

Great application to issue certificates

Certifier is a great application for anyone who needs to issue certificates. Their customer support is always happy to answer any questions. We’ve had a few calls, and each time Certifier's team would go the extra mile to help us.

![Image 101: Taras Gopko](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729863890%2Fimage_4_fikmk5.png&w=128&q=75)Taras Gopko

Founder and CEO

![Image 102: Atlantic University](https://certifier.io/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fcertifier%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fv1729864304%2Fimage_221_2_hlumqy.png&w=256&q=75)

Certifier automates certification

It is an awesome tool to work with. Certifier not only simplifies the certification process but also automates certificate verification and design, enabling us to produce accurate certificates swiftly.
